title: Vatra - The Vulcan's fury
body:
http://crispyleaves1.deviantart.com/art/12675245-1691176957825937-767240055-O-589487623?ga_submit_new=10%253A1454918813)

Okay, so in art class a few years back i did a watercolour painting of a woman with lava dripping around her as a dress. And only recently have i thought how cool it would be to make it a champion. So here it is, btw Vatra means fire in Croatian @google translate. 

Passive - Scorching sorrow
Every 12/10/8 seconds, Vatra's next basic ability burns the targets hit for 20-200 true damage. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second for every enemy champion afflicted. And only applies on the first tick of damage on her W. 

Q - Pyroclastic burst
Vatra sends a burst of pyroclastic energy forward, stopping at the first unit hit. This damages the first unit hit for moderate Magic damage. If Scorching sorrow is ready, Pyroclastic burst will stun the first enemy hit. And if it comes in contact with her W - Magma Well, it explodes. Dealing reduced damage to enemies in an area behind the well. 

W - Magma Well
Vatra summons forth a well of scorching lava, dealing damage in that area over 4/4.5/5/5.5/6 seconds. This stores 3 charges and can only be cast a second or third time if the Magma Well shares a border with another magma well. 

E - Tectonic implosion
Vatra implodes the tectonics in a small cone infront of her. Pulling all enemies toward her. This ability can not apply Scorching Sorrow. If this ability is cast on terrain or her Magma Wells, it instead pulls Vatra toward the terrain. 

R - Divine Cataclysm 
Vatra summons an explosive volcano at a target location. This Volcano counts as terrain. It slows all nearby enemy champions by 20/30/40% and deals small magic damage every second. Every 2 seconds, after a short indication and delay. The volcano throws out trails of lava. Dealing large damage to all enemies hit. 

This kit makes Vatra a control mage. Using her abilities to cut off chokepoints and control large scale engagements from a distance. Her laning phase is relatively strong, due to her ability to control the enemy champions movement. Although she is very susceptible to assassinations and burst mages, who can kill her before she has the chance to damage them back.

" If this ability is cast on terrain or her Magma Wells, it instead pulls Vatra toward the terrain."
What if an enemy is in that cone? Does it pull them towards Vatra and also Vatra to the Magma Well/Terrain?

Also, a some of these abilities names sound like those of other champions;
Cataclysm - Jarvan
Pyroclastic - Brand

Her passive is also pretty much Gangplanks :/

1 more question, is she ranged or melee? It sounds like she is ranged, but certain things in her kit make her sound melee.

Sorry for criticizing, she seems like a great champion, just needs some refining :)

Thanks for all the constructive comments, i think i will take that advice Slyzza. It does make a lot more sense to have it floating around her than set in the middle of somewhere, especially if people can already dodge it.

I can see it now actually, first up it looks like another weird kit that people make up. But it makes sense. She has the ability to keep people on top of her pools without the need of hard cc. And her ulti will be deadly in teamfights if positioned correctly. Maybe you could make it so that her ult transformed herself into a vessel of some sort. I mean it would be hard to keep people on top of the volcano. But if she was walking around with this huge damage in a circle around her, it would be much easier to use. Just saying.

First off, that artwork is amazing. I would love to be able to do stuff like that. Her kit seems pretty interesting actually, it would take quite a bit of skill to be able to make it work. Maybe buffing the passive damage early would also be nice. Over all, i think its a great start to a champ. I honestly think riot should take a look at this one.
